metadata.name: We in this 2gether
metadata.description:
By now you've probably realized that AI can fully replace the NFT Influencer. (a thread ğŸ§µ )

After only receiving limited contextual inputs, I was able to generate a convincing video that is nearly indistinguishable from 90% of NFT Influencers.

Here's how I did it ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¾ 

I listened to a bunch of NFT Influencers shovel shit into the wallets of Normies who had just entered the NFT Community for 2 years.

I wrote a script based on that. I'd suggest starting with ChatGPT now, but it doesn't write like this yet. Use a custom data set.

I used an AI SaaS product to render my script into proof that we live in a simulation. 

- Text to Speaking AI Avatar (Human option was avail, but I liked her attitude!)
- "NFT" images are stock but AI art would work
- Browser-based video instant edit
- Everything in the video is fully licensed for my commercial use, including owning the IP I create

This is art by JL. ğŸ¨  

My first release on Foundation. Thank you for your support! I love my community! ğŸ’œ
